name: mikroe.click.inclinometer3
short_description: Inclinometer 3 Click is a compact add-on board for precise tilt and leveling measurement applications. This board features the SCL3400-D01, a two-axis inclinometer sensor from Murata, leveraging advanced capacitive 3D-MEMS technology. It features a high-performance mixed-signal ASIC with a flexible SPI digital interface housed in a robust 12-pin pre-molded casing, ensuring long-term reliability and performance.
